com.tradersgem2.lists

Class StockList

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tradersgem2.lists.StockList
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable, java.util.Collection, java.util.List
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Portfolio, WatchList

    public abstract class StockList
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.List
    This StockList class is a super class to sub list classes such as watchList and Portfolio; StockList holds all the stocks from all the sublists that extend it . It then makes the report to the database between the classes that have been added or subtracted from the sublists.
    Author:
    Luiz Medeiros

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StockList(Context c, java.lang.String uA)
      This is the constructor of StockList, the superClass of the all other list related classes that contain stocks as their main dataStructure;
